title: CookieFun Skills
description: Configuration schema for CookieFun API skills

get_sectors.title: Get Sectors
get_sectors.description: State of the get_sectors skill that returns a list of all available sectors in the CookieFun system

get_account_details.title: Get Account Details
get_account_details.description: State of the get_account_details skill that retrieves detailed information about a Twitter account

get_account_smart_followers.title: Get Account Smart Followers
get_account_smart_followers.description: State of the get_account_smart_followers skill that returns a list of top smart followers for a specific Twitter account

search_accounts.title: Search Accounts
search_accounts.description: State of the search_accounts skill that searches for Twitter accounts that authored tweets matching specified search criteria

get_account_feed.title: Get Account Feed
get_account_feed.description: State of the get_account_feed skill that retrieves a list of tweets for a specific Twitter account with various filtering options

states.description: States for each CookieFun skill (disabled, public, or private)

api_key.title: CookieFun API Key
api_key.description: Your CookieFun API key (required for all CookieFun skills)
